title: Snapchat acc got device banned
text: Hello Snapchat support, hoping you are having a great day, yes i know I'm emailing at a late hour but my account was just signed out for no reason! I don't post anything inappropriate or anything so I'm not understanding why it got signed out. I am not able to sign in, but it works on other devices but mine. I'm hoping you can fix it and let me back into my account, please let me know what the problem is because i don't do anything wrong for me to get lock out that was very strange and weird that, that happened. Today I tried logging into my Snapchat account but noticed that it said my device was banned I believe I was hacked when I removed the account and tried to re add it it gave me an error message of SS06, can someone help me figure this out and help me get my account unbanned. I have tried logging in and it gives a device banned notification, I have done nothing wrong, will you be able to help me clear this mess and unban my device. It says my account is temporarily disabled due to suspicious activity/reapted attempts, but I just kept logging in and out because my phone was glitching and not logging my Snapchat in.
